original_title: Nine Inch Nails- Lights In The Sky Tour
overview: The Lights In The Sky Tour took place between July and December 2008 in North America and South America in support of Ghosts I-IV and The Slip. The tour was also essentially supporting Year Zero for the audiences it reached, as the Performance 2007 tour had not covered those parts of the world.
title: Nine Inch Nails- Lights In The Sky Tour
